name: Yaga Goo
description: The Yaga Goo is a small, amorphous ooze with a sinister nature, known for its agility and deadly attacks.
memorable: Its ability to teleport and create hazardous puddles makes it a unique and constant threat in combat.
goals: To ambush its foes and spread fear through necrotic damage.
relations: Often found alone but can be encountered with other oozes or fey creatures.
environment: Typically found in dark, hidden places and ruins.
strengths: Immunity to necrotic damage; advantage on attacks against fey creatures; excellent stealth capabilities.
weaknesses: Average intelligence and charisma limits its strategic capabilities.
attacks: Can make two pseudopod attacks that deal bludgeoning and necrotic damage; uses teleportation to evade attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Foul Transit allows it to teleport while inflicting necrotic damage in the area it vacated.
senses: Blindsight within 60 feet allows it to perceive surroundings without sight.
skills: Proficient in stealth with an impressive +10 modifier.
additional_information: Can squeeze through openings as narrow as 1 inch.
Ability to poison creatures that enter its created puddles.
Puddle Splash reaction enables it to teleport and counterattack.
Forms puddles that remain for a minute or until it is killed.
Has a strong dexterity score, enhancing its ambush tactics.
test_queries: elusive ooze with deadly necrotic attacks
small ooze that creates hazardous puddles
ambush creature with necrotic and bludgeoning damage
cunning ooze that poisons and evades attacks
